asciidoctor.description: Set if the current processor is Asciidoctor.

backend.description: Backend used to create the output file.

basebackend.description: The backend value minus any trailing numbers.

docdate.description: Last modified date of the source document.

docdatetime.description: Last modified date and time of the source document.

docdir.description: Full path of the directory that contains the source document.

docfile.description: Full path of the source document.

docname.description: Root name of the source document (no leading path or file extension).

doctime.description: Last modified time of the source document.

embedded.description: Set if content is being converted to an embeddable document (body only).

filetype.description: File extension of the output file name (without leading period).

htmlsyntax.description: Syntax used when generating the HTML output (html or xhtml).

outdir.description: Full path of the output directory.

outfile.description: Full path of the output file.

outfilesuffix.description: Default file extension of output file.

safe-mode-level.description: Numeric value of the safe mode setting.

safe-mode-name.description: Textual value of the safe mode setting.

safe-mode-unsafe.description: Set if the safe mode is UNSAFE.

safe-mode-safe.description: Set if the safe mode is SAFE.

safe-mode-server.description: Set if the safe mode is SERVER.

safe-mode-secure.description: Set if the safe mode is SECURE.

user-home.description: Home directory of the current user.
